mapper.select: SELECT app.`app_name` FROM `t_app_info` app LEFT JOIN `t_app_api` aa ON aa.`app_id` = app.`id` LEFT JOIN t_api_info api ON api.`id` = aa.`api_id` LEFT JOIN `t_server_info` s ON s.id = api.`server_id` WHERE s.id = ${serverId} and app.is_deleted = '0' and aa.is_deleted = '0' and api.is_deleted = '0' and s.is_deleted = '0' ORDER BY app.id LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `t_server_info` s WHERE s.`upsteam_node_name` = #{upSteamNodeName} AND s.`is_deleted` = '0'
AND s.`id` != #{id}

SELECT u.id FROM `t_server_info` s LEFT JOIN `t_upsteam_name` n ON n.`upsteam_name` = s.`upsteam_node_name` LEFT JOIN `t_upsteam_node` u ON n.`upsteam_name` = u.`node_name` WHERE s.`server_name` = #{serverName} AND u.`running_status` = '0' AND s.`is_deleted` = '0' AND n.`is_deleted` = '0' AND u.`is_deleted` = '0';

SELECT s.`upsteam_node_name`, s.`is_ssl`, s.`listen_port`, s.`ssl_listen_port`, s.`server_host`, s.`ssl_crt_path`, s.`ssl_crt_key_path` FROM `t_server_info` s WHERE s.`is_front` = '1' AND s.`is_deleted` = '0'
